You can contact the team in several ways:

=== Mailing list ===
The best way to contact us is through the mailing list, the address is ubuntu-sugarteam AT lists DOT ubuntu DOT com. You can also join the mailing list at http://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/Ubuntu-sugarteam.

=== IRC ===
We can also be found on IRC, on the Freenode server '''irc.freenode.net''' at #ubuntu-sugarteam.

=== Upstream ===
Contact the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.sugarlabs.org/go/Development_Team|Sugar Labs development team]]</nowiki> if you are interested in participating.
